channel.title: [ REQUEST ] Banner for website -- Read inside for info
channel.description:
Right im currently on my laptop = no photoshop cos i lost it due to a virus XD yah i kno silly
But im wondering if someone could make me a banner for my site im making called game aim
I know the specifications ect i dunno if theres a form so ill just write it out
Text: Game aim Font: What looks best Colour of text: White??
Colour for image: like medium blue ( not too light or not too dark ) Pics on it: People with swords and guns
Size of banner: 641 by 145 in pixels ( Yeah thats 641 across and 145 down i guess )
:P I hope this can be possible your my last hope
